Sasuke uses his chokuto sword to channel an extremely powerful [[Chidori]]. It appears to have an even greater range than [[Chidori Current]], making it more effective in battle. It can be noted that this technique is more of a use on water, because the lightning current produced is carried on the entire surface making it more difficult for the enemy to avoid it.
